DOC.brief_summary: A study evaluate solifenacin succinate combination tamsulosin treatment residual OAB symptom men .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Solifenacin Succinate Combination With Tamsulosin Treatment Residual Overactive Bladder Symptoms ( OAB ) Men .
DOC.detailed_description: A 2 arm study ( 1 Active , 1 Placebo ) evaluate solifenacin succinate combination tamsulosin treatment residual OAB symptom men
DOC.criteria: Symptoms Overactive Bladder ( OAB ) Current use antimuscarinic therapy Evidence urinary tract infection
